entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 12 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 12 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow in the evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022
